name: reckless

effect.x_y: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power. struggle is unaffected. The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.

short_effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.x_y: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
